title: Ticket #477: Improve monitoring BNL pilot submission at UW
description:
It would be nice if here at UW we could more easily monitor the health of US ATLAS pilot job submissions going on at BNL.

Miron suggested an idea: perhaps if the collector at BNL forwarded grid ads to a collector here at UW ?
remarks:
2009-May-20 14:01:53 by xzhao:
At the CondorWeek, Jaime and I talked about transplanting CondorView to Condor-G submit host, so historical job submission statistics can be viewed. If that is overkill, a command line tool, which can show the number of jobs submitted in the last 10 minutes, or 1 hour etc, and their status, is certainly desirable.

2009-Jul-16 10:23:21 by jfrey:
A collector is now running at nostos.cs.wisc.edu:9619 for ads from BNL submit hosts. Two BNL hosts are currently sending ads to it.

2009-Jul-29 15:16:57 by jfrey:
Adding a second collector to COLLECTOR_HOST turned up a bug in the gridmanager's code for advertising to the collector (#627). A fix has been made for future Condor releases. In the mean time, BNL's submit machines are currently using CONDOR_VIEW_HOST to forward the ads to the Wisconsin collector.
